name: Emspoma Cooling Massage Emulsion 1000 ml
descr:
Designed for massage and self-massage with the aim of evoking feelings of cooling and refreshment in parts of the body with a long-term effect. It hould be used for massages to relieve fatigue in hot weather.
 
Dermatologicaly tested. Effect on the skin: Neutral pH-value.
 
Also available in 200 ml and 500 ml version.
